scripts.pm2:restart: if pm2 show untitiled ; then pm2 restart untitiled ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled' ; fi
scripts.pm2:stop: if pm2 show untitiled ; then pm2 stop untitiled ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled' ; fi
scripts.pm2:delete: if pm2 show untitiled ; then pm2 delete untitiled ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled' ; fi
scripts.pm2:reboot: npm ci && npm run build && npm run pm2:stop && npm run pm2:delete && npm run pm2:start
